content.rendered:
Choosing what Valentine’s Day gift to get for your significant other can be a difficult task. You could stick to the basics and get flowers and chocolates for that special someone, or you could get them a gift from AVA to go on that next adventure. Whether it is rafting, ziplining, rock climbing or a number of other activities, AVA has something that would make the perfect Valentine’s Day gift.


AVA offers a number of whitewater rafting options. We have outposts around Colorado that raft on a number of different rivers. Whether you are looking for a mild, relaxing trip or an adrenaline filled ride full of rapids, we have plenty of choices. For those looking for a more extreme trip The Gauntlet is the perfect choice. This trip out of our Granite Outpost features some of the most continuous and steepest sections of rapids in the state of Colorado. Your experienced guide will help you navigate class 3 through 5 rapids that will definitely leave you smiling at the end of the day!

If rafting isn’t for you we have plenty of drier options. If you’re ready to get your feet off the ground we offer both ziplining and rock climbing. If you have never tried these activities, no worries; our guides are right there to help you learn the basics. All of our rock climbs are “top-roped” meaning if you do lose your grip you will only take short fall before the rope softly catches you! Our zip lines will give you great views of snow capped peaks as you fly above the ground at speeds up to 30mph! Our Rock Climbing and Zip Line package at our Granite Outpost offers the perfect combination of both activities!

For those looking to slow things down a bit fly fishing is the perfect choice. We offer fly fishing in Breckenridge, Buena Vista, and Kremmling. If you have never been fly fishing either the half day or full day “never-ever” trip is perfect along the Arkansas River. This will include all the gear needed and instruction by a highly experienced guide to help you land that monster Rainbow Trout!

If you’re unsure of what activity would be best for your significant other we also offer gift certificates that can be used for any of our trips! If you have more questions about what trip would be best be sure to give us a call at 877-RAFTING (877-723-8464).
